body:
Austrian Force is a well-established association founded in 2007 and one of Austria's biggest and respected organizations in the scene. We are well known for our league appearances as well as our passion in organizing some of the biggest LAN events including streaming with a production quality sufficient to host official RIOT events like the premiere tour held at the Vienna Comic-Con in 2018.

We are looking for motivated people, which pursue a future in E-Sports. It doesn’t matter if you already proved yourself in the scene or just started to pursue a career, as long as you are willing to put in the effort needed to take Austrian Force and yourself to the next step.

**Team & E-Sports Manager**

Requirements:

* At least 18 years old
* Social skills
* Willing to learn
* Fluent in English & German

Your everyday tasks:

* Organizing scrims for our League of Legends Team
* Corresponding with potential sponsors / event manager / tournament admins
* Looking for potential sponsors
* Scheduling meetings
* Interviewing potential candidates for new positions

**Assistant League of Legends Coach**

Requirements:

* At least 18 years old
* Willing to learn
* Diamond V +
* E-Sports & League of Legends enthusiast

Your everyday tasks:

* Coaching players
* Developing strategies / drafts / team compositions
* Maintaining our practice plan

**What we are able to provide**

A safe and friendly environment to learn and improve as well as access to one of the most respected communities in Austria. You will be able to collect valuable experiences for your future career path.

Depending on your and the teams' success with Austrian Force, paid remuneration may be possible.

If you are interested message our Head of E-Sports & Head Coach David "Bishi" Scheithauer on Twitter (BishiLoL) or Discord (Bishi6540). You can also send your application to bewerbung@austrianforce.at

**Sharing this post is highly appreciated!**
